title: Construction of a coumarin-based fluorescent probe for accurately visualizing hydrogen sulfide in live cells and zebrafish
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16327-16331
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00668B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiao Wei, Long Mi, Shenglong Dong, Hui Yang, Shiyuan Xu
Hydrogen sulfide (H2S), an important gas signaling molecule, is a regulator of many physiological processes, and its abnormal levels are closely related to the onset and progression of disease.
